description: Replace home page title in metadata
find: <xf:macro template="metadata_macros" name="title" arg-title="{{ page_title() ?: $siteName }}" arg-output="{{ true }}" />
replace:
<xf:if is="{$xf.options.hampelHomePageTitleReplaceMetadata} && {$xf.options.hampelHomePageTitle} && {$template} == 'forum_list' && {$xf.options.forumsDefaultPage} == 'forums'">
	<xf:macro template="metadata_macros" name="title" arg-title="{$xf.options.hampelHomePageTitle}" arg-output="{{ true }}" />
<xf:elseif is="{$xf.options.hampelHomePageTitleReplaceMetadata} && {$xf.options.hampelHomePageTitle} && {$template} == 'forum_new_posts' && {$xf.options.forumsDefaultPage} == 'new_posts'" />
	<xf:macro template="metadata_macros" name="title" arg-title="{$xf.options.hampelHomePageTitle}" arg-output="{{ true }}" />
<xf:else />
	$0
</xf:if>
